description:
A freeware released to play AMR audio files.

AMR Player is one freeware to let you can play the AMR audio files on your PC, and support to convert common multimedia file formats ( such as MP3 or WAV) to audio AMR/AWB format, or output AMR audio files to MP3/WAV audio format. AMR Player support AMR-NB( NarrowBand ) and AMR-WB( WideBand ), the audio conversions include AMR to MP3, AMR to WAV, MP3 to AMR, WAV to AMR, it is very fast and easy to use.
